Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides that elderly and long-time residents of public housing shall not be subject to transfers based on family composition
Summary: Provides that elderly and long-time residents of public housing shall not be subject to transfers based on family composition.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to limiting the right of the New York city housing authority to transfer elderly and long-time residents from their housing accommodations
